content: **knitted jumper with short sleeves in drops belle or drops sky piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with round yoke size s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #moondustsweater drops design pattern vs-124 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 350-400-400-450-500-550 g colour 24 sand or use drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 24 sand **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
